formalpara.title: Figure 1: Life cycle of P. pacificus in comparison to C. elegans.
formalpara.para: P. pacificus propagates through four juvenile stages, called J1 to J4. In contrast to C. elegans, the J1 to J2 molt is embryonic and only the J2 stage hatches from the egg. Dauer formation occurs as alternative J3 stage, as in C. elegans. The direct life cycle takes approximately 4 days at 20°C.
